name: Blue Hunters
description:
• Contains MOBA elements
  • Features Quickplay Matchmaking

In Blue Hunters you:

  • Play a 1v1 match against an opponent
  • Control a ship
  • Build towers on your ship, same as tower defense games
  • Attack your opponents with the towers on your ship
  • Navigate the map to come up with the best way to destroy your enemy base

Discord Channel - https://discord.gg/NRDySt

  • Updates about the game.
  • People to play the game with.
